column1: * [[Isildur]] plants a seedling of the [[White Tree of Gondor
column2: White Tree]] in [[Minas Anor]]. He delivers the [[South-kingdom]] to [[Meneldil]].<ref name="AppB2">{{App
Gladden}}, note 9 says Isildur left on ''[[Yavannië]] 5'' which corresponds with our [[27 August
column3: August 27]] depending on how you calculate</ref>

column1: * '''25''' [[Disaster of the Gladden Fields]]; deaths of Isildur, [[Elendur (son of Isildur)
column3: Gladden}} states the event happened on the "thirtieth day", so 29 days later being [[25 September
